message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $10,500.  What do you say?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $11,500 for you, which is a compromise between our previous offers. What do you think?
